name: Federal Investigation Agency Rules, 1975
tagline: Establishing the Federal Investigation Agency Rules
content:
. R. 0. 130 (I)175.-In exercise of the powers conferred by sub-section 	(1) 
9f section 9 of the Federal Investi at' ' 	A  • 	
a 	of 1975), the 
Federal Government is please • to make the following rules :- 
Short title and commencement.-(1) These rules may be called the Fed: iii
Investigation Agency Rules, 1975. 
(2) They shall come into force at once. 
Defibidons.-In these rules, unless there is anything repugnant in the sub-
ject or the context,— 
" Act " means the Federal Investigation Agency Act, 1974 (VIII of 
1975) ; 
" Agency " means the Federal Investigation Agency, constituted under •  
the Act; and 
"Director-General" means the Director-General of the Federal In-
- • vestigation Agency appointed under sub-section (2) of section 3 of 
the Act. 
3 . The Director-General shall exercise in respect of the Agency all powers 
exercisable, under the Police Act, 1861 (V of 1861), by an Inspector-General of 
Police. 
[No. 10/1/75-FIA-II.] MOHSIN MANZOOR, 
Deputy Secretary, ;
